blog.excerpt: The Twin Drive System (or Twin Drive) is a next-generation drive system in Mobile Suit Gundam 00 that synchronizes two GN Drives to exponentially increase their GN Particle generation rate

next.title: Gundam Meister
next.excerpt: are pilots in Mobile Suit Gundam 00 (and side stories), who are chosen by Veda and Celestial Being to operate the mobile units labeled "Gundams". Once selected and approved by Veda, a Meister is assigned to service under the tactical supervision of their coordinators.
